__NOTOC__ float '''GetDistance''' (bool ''checkz'' [, int ''ptr_select''])
== Usage == Gets the distance between the calling actor and the pointer.
Note that this function is to be used where an [[DECORATE expressions|expression]] is expected. It is mostly useful when combined with {{c|[[A_JumpIf]]}} and can be used in place of such functions like {{c|[[A_JumpIfCloser]]}}.
=== Parameters === * ''checkz'': Indicates whether to factor in how high up an actor is. If false, pretends both the calling and pointed actor are both on flat ground. * ''ptr_select'': the pointer to examine. Default is {{c|{{const|AAPTR_TARGET}}}}. Must be a pointer other than {{c|{{const|AAPTR_DEFAULT}}}} or {{c|{{const|AAPTR_NULL}}}}. See [[actor pointers]].
=== Return value === Returns the distance in double floatation precision.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
